items.title: Oppo Pad Air5 goes official with a 12.1-inch display, Dimensity 7300-Ultra SoC
items.summary: Oppo has launched the Pad Air5 in China following a series of teasers, including an official unboxing video. The Oppo Pad Air5 is equipped with the MediaTek Dimensity 7300-Ultra SoC, paired with the Mali-G615 MC2 GPU, LPDDR5X RAM and UFS 3.1 storage. It is available in both Wi-Fi and cellular optioâ€¦

items.title: 'England must stir themselves to find a Christmas miracle'
items.summary: England must stir themselves and move on from investigations and social media videos if they want to avoid a potential 5-0 Ashes whitewash, writes chief cricket report Stephan Shemilt.

items.title: No spinner for Australia on 'grassy' MCG pitch
items.summary: Australia will not play a spinner in the Boxing Day Test on a Melbourne pitch stand-in captain Steve Smith described as â€œquite furry, quite greenâ€.

items.title: 'I'm not retiring' - Kipchoge's marathon world tour
items.summary: Sporting great Eliud Kipchoge says his plan to run marathons on seven different continents is about purpose, not records.

items.title: Samsung debuts new Odyssey gaming monitor lineup with up to 1,040Hz refresh rate
items.summary: Ahead of CES 2026, Samsung has announced the 2026 range of Odyssey gaming monitors. There are a total of five models and they offer features such as 6K glasses-free 3D support and up to 1,040Hz refresh rate. Samsung has introduced the Odyssey 3D, the Odyssey G6, and three variants of the Odyssey G8â€¦
